00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "LambdaConstant.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 LambdaConstant::LambdaConstant( double lambda, TargetCalculator* W )
00041   : mLambda(lambda), mTarget(W)
00042   {}
00043 
00044 LambdaConstant::~LambdaConstant()
00045   {}
00046 
00047 bool LambdaConstant::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00048                                     size_t element,
00049                                     Sample sample,
00050                                     MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00051                                     MsqError& err )
00052 {
00053   bool valid = mTarget->get_3D_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00054   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00055     return false;
00056   double lambda = this->size( W_out );
00057   if (lambda < 1e-50)
00058     return false;
00059   W_out *= mLambda/lambda;
00060   return true;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool LambdaConstant::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00064                                     size_t element,
00065                                     Sample sample,
00066                                     MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00067                                     MsqError& err )
00068 {
00069   bool valid = mTarget->get_surface_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00070   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00071     return false;
00072   double lambda = this->size( W_out );
00073   if (lambda < 1e-50)
00074     return false;
00075   W_out *= mLambda/lambda;
00076   return true;
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 bool LambdaConstant::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00081                                     size_t element,
00082                                     Sample sample,
00083                                     MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00084                                     MsqError& err )
00085 {
00086   bool valid = mTarget->get_2D_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00087   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00088     return false;
00089   double lambda = this->size( W_out );
00090   if (lambda < 1e-50)
00091     return false;
00092   W_out *= mLambda/lambda;
00093   return true;
00094 }
